mapper.select: SELECT fud.user.username,fud.role.role_name FROM fud.user u,fud.role r,fud.user_role ur WHERE u.id=#{id} AND u.id=ur.user_id AND r.id=ur.role_id
SELECT r.role_name FROM fud.user u,fud.role r,fud.user_role ur WHERE u.username=#{username} AND u.id=ur.user_id AND r.id=ur.user_id

SELECT p.permission FROM fud.user u,fud.role r,fud.permission p,fud.role_permission rp,fud.user_role ur WHERE u.username=#{username} AND u.id=ur.user_id AND r.id=ur.role_id AND r.id=rp.role_id AND p.id=rp.permission_id
